summary: The tradition of the Irish pub. Speaking to pub owners all over Ireland, Alex Fegan gets into the heart of what makes "the Irish pub" the institution that it is.
cast: Liam Aherne|Willie Aherne|Bobby Blackwell|Ray Blackwell|Tom Breen|Nan Brennan|Patricia Brennan|Simon Coyle|James Curran|Garry Cusack|Lisa Fennin|Michael Finucane|Paul Gartlan|Eugene Kavanagh|Billy Keane|Pat Keane|Regina Keane|J.P. Leonard|Michael Loughman|Dano Mackey|P.J. McCaffrey|Adrienne McCarthy|Annie McGinn|Vincent 'Jasper' Murphy|Emma O'Brien|Peter O'Loclainn|Thomas O'Shaughnessy|Carmel O'Shea|Ollie Quinlan|Joe Shanley|Michael Smyth
title: The Irish Pub
